abstract:
Your business is all set up and ready. You want to enter the market with
a new product or service. As digital communication evolves, brands and
companies are constantly facing new challenges. The ways of providing
information and interacting become more and more multi-layered and
complex. A well-defined communicative base can serve as a corrective
that prevents technology from becoming self-serving.

*Tags:* Business & Start-Ups, Community

Scheduled on `thursday 15:25 </schedule/#thu-15:25-media>`__ in room
media

title: How to make your (digital) Communication strong & future ready
